title: Police fire tear gas at protestors surrounding MP residences
body_lines: Police have fired tear gas to disperse protestors who had gathered in front of MP Gamini Lokuge's residence in Mavittara, Piliyandala. The protestors had gathered in the area since evening.
Meanwhile, police fired tear gas at protestors who gathered around MP Keheliya Rambukwella's residence in Kandy, a short while ago.
